title: Isn't It a Lovely View
description: A crippled woman who witnessed a murder refuses to admit it, and the authorities begin to suspect that her husband may have committed the crime because he was being blackmailed.

roles.char: Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine

title: Tears from a Silver Dipper
description: A young Hispanic soldier is nabbed stealing drugs from an army base. He soon becomes a suspect in a murder, but racial prejudice appears to be affecting the outcome of his court-martial.

title: A Shield Is for Hiding Behind
My Name Is Martin Burnham
description: An engineer intent on committing suicide accidentally kills a co-worker while trying to jump from a high-rise site, and is charged with murder. At his trial he offers no defense, hoping that he will get the death penalty.

title: A Flame in the Dark
description: Anderson forms an attachment with a young boy who may have shot and killed his mother by accident, but the boy's aggressive, bellicose father has a strong reaction to what he consider's the detective's "interference".

roles.char: Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine

title: Whose Little Girl Are You?
description: A tool-and-die craftsman is devastated by the loss of his dexterity and coordination, especially after he learns that his company is going to let him go. He winds up killing the obnoxious and abusive machinist who is going to replace him.

roles.char: Asst. Deputy Dist. Atty. Barry Pine

title: The Witnesses
description: A schoolteacher witnesses a murder, and when the wrong man is arrested for the crime, she wrestles with her conscience about coming forward--she was with a married man at the time, and if that became known, it could ruin her reputation and result in her losing her job.

title: Inquest Into a Bleeding Heart
description: A little girl is run over and seriously injured by a motorcycle. A disgraced doctor who has had his medical license revoked rushes over and performs emergency surgery on her to try to save her life, but she dies anyway. Soon the doctor finds himself charged with practicing medicine without a license.

roles.char: Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine
Asst. Deputy Dist. Atty. Barry Pine

title: Run, Little Man, Run
description: During a stick-up at a church bazaar, a woman with a heart condition is literally scared to death. An investigation leads the police to a small-time hood, who is arrested after he is identified by the dead woman's husband, who was there. However, the more scrutiny the case comes under, the more suspicions are raised that things aren't quite as open-and-shut as they seem.

title: Funny Man with a Monkey
description: A heroin-addicted nightclub comic is arrested on a drug-related homicide, and at his trial he intends to challenge the state's anti-narcotic laws.

roles.char: Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine
Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine
Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine
Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine
Assistant Deputy District Attorney Barry Pine

title: The Revenge of the Worm
description: A truck driver finds himself deep in debt after he's forced to borrow money from a loan shark. When he can't pay the outrageous interest, the hood threatens to kill his family if he doesn't come up with the money. Enraged at the threat to his family's life, the trucker decides to take matters into his own hands.
